name: CompanionVR
description:
In this game your goal is to get to the other end of the level with your companion.

Climb and carry it or throw your companion and try to make it. But if you thow it it gets damaged 25%.

Made by A.M. van der Meer

It was in a hurry and I was stuck in dev hell and school stuff but I will update it to be perfect when I have the time. Did you find any bugs please message me on https://twitter.com/AMvanderMeer There i will respond the fastest.
